scripts.apps: yarn run appsJS; yarn run appsCSS; yarn run appsEmailCSS
scripts.appsCSS: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/sass-mq --include-path core/src/main/resources/css --output build/ core/src/main/resources/; postcss build/*/*/*.css -u autoprefixer --dir build/
scripts.appsEmailCSS: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/sass-mq --include-path core/src/main/resources/css --include-path email/src/main/resources/css --output build/ email/src/main/resources/; postcss build/*/*/*.css -u autoprefixer --dir build/
scripts.frontend: yarn run frontendJS; yarn run copy; yarn run frontendCSS
scripts.frontendCSS: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/sass-mq --include-path core/src/main/resources/css --output dist/ core/src/main/resources/
